sentence.Network_en: Laser discs can store prodigious amounts of information.
sentence.Network_cn: 激光磁盘能够贮存大量信息。

sentence.Network_en: This business generates cash in prodigious amounts.
He impressed all who met him with his prodigious memory.
sentence.Network_cn: 他惊人的记忆力让所有见过他的人都印象深刻。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (in the sense 'portentous'): from Latin prodigiosus, from prodigium 'portent' (see prodigy)

entry.tran: 巨大的；庞大的；大得惊人的
entry.def: Something that is prodigious is very large or impressive.

example.ex: This business generates cash in prodigious amounts...
He impressed all who met him with his prodigious memory.
example.tran: 他惊人的记忆力让所有见过他的人都印象深刻。

means.word_mean: 1. so great in size or force or extent as to elicit awe;

sentences.sentence: "colossal crumbling ruins of an ancient temple"
"such a portentous...monster raised all my curiosity"- Herman Melville

means.word_mean: 3. far beyond what is usual in magnitude or degree;

sentences.sentence: "olympian efforts to save the city from bankruptcy"

auth_sentence.content: Henry, whose memory was prodigious, had forgotten...nothing.
auth_sentence.res_content: Henry, whose memory was prodigious, had forgotten...nothing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Henry, whose memory was prodigious, had forgotten...nothing.

auth_sentence.content: He was a prodigious philanderer who was wretchedly sterile.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was a prodigious philanderer who was wretchedly sterile.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was a prodigious philanderer who was wretchedly sterile.

auth_sentence.content: The Electoral Prince of Bavaria, heir to prodigious domains.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Electoral Prince of Bavaria, heir to prodigious domains.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Electoral Prince of Bavaria, heir to prodigious domains.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"赞同,亲…"; 2. 也有"代替"之意; 3. 表示"向前,在前;预先"; 4. 表示"很多…"

stems_affixes.word_buile: pro赞同,亲…+American美国的, 美洲的→adj.亲美的
pro赞同,亲…+slavery奴隶制→adj.赞成奴隶制的
pro=pro向前,在前;预先+ig=act做→做在前面,做得多→大量的
pro向前,在前;预先+fici做+ent……的→做在[别人] 前面→精通
pro向前,在前;预先+min小,伸+ent……的→向前伸出的小部分→杰出的
pro向前,在前;预先+vid看+ent……的→向前看的→有远见的
pro很多…+flig打出+ate……的→把钱不断的打出去→挥霍的
pro很多…+fuse流→流很多→大量的
pro很多…+lif+ic……的→带来东西→多产的
pro很多…+sper希望+ous……的→希望很多→兴旺的
pro代替+louct说+or人→n. 议长;代言人
pro代替+noun名词→n.代名词
pro向前+blem抛→抛出问题
pro向前,在前;预先+cliv倾斜+ity表名词→向前倾斜
pro向前,在前;预先+fil线条+e→前面的线条
pro向前,在前;预先+gress走→向前走
pro向前,在前;预先+ject扔→扔向前面→投射;引申为工程项目
pro向前,在前;预先+logue说→在前面说→前言
pro向前,在前;预先+spect看→向前看→前景
pro很多…+fit=fic做→做很多→做得好→利润
pro向前,在前;预先+cure关心→关心在前→[想要]获得
pro向前,在前;预先+fess说→在前面说坦白
pro向前,在前;预先+ject扔→扔向前面→投射;引申为工程项目
pro向前,在前;预先+long长→向前拉长→延长
pro向前,在前;预先+mot动+e→向前动→促进
pro向前,在前;预先+pel推→向前推
pro向前,在前;预先+secu追随+te→追随到[法院]前面→检举;指控
pro向前,在前;预先+trud推,突出+e→向前突出
pro向前,在前;预先+vok喊+e→在[你]前面喊→激怒[你]
pro很多…+crastin明天+ate表动词→有许多明天明日复明日→拖延
pro很多…+create创造→创造很多→生儿育女
pro很多…+lifer=fer带来+ate表动词→带来很多生命→繁殖

means.word_mean: 异常的,惊人的,奇异的;巨大的
